mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, Robert, 1816-1877
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Declines invitation to address a Bigler Club in Colomia, Pa. [?]; feels that Col. Bigler will "not only be nominated by the Democratic State Convention," but will be elected by the people in the fall to the "gubernatorial office"; he is first always for Pennsylvania. Printed in Auchampaugh. Autograph Letter Signed
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1851 April 11, Robert Tyler, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania to Mr. N.B. Wolfe
